directions: If using shrimp, preheat a grill to medium high.
Dice the bell pepper. Thinly slice the radishes. Peel the cucumber (or peel alternating strips), then thinly slice it. Dice the mango.
Place the shrimp onto skewers. Sprinkle the shrimp lightly with kosher salt, cumin and paprika. Grill over medium high heat until pink and opaque, about 3 to 5 minutes per side.

To make the dressing, chop the scallions. In a blender or immersion blender cup, add ⅔ cup Greek yogurt, ½ cup lightly packed cilantro, juice from 1 lime (2 tablespoons), ⅓ cup olive oil,½ teaspoon salt, and 1 tablespoon honey, and blend to combine. (Transfer to a sealable container; stores in the refrigerator for 1 week.)
To serve, place salad greens on a plate. Top with vegetables, shrimp (if using), and cashews. Drizzle with lime cilantro dressing.
ingredients: ½ cup roasted and salted cashews
¾ pound shrimp, shelled and deveined (optional)
title: Tropical Mango Salad with Cilantro Lime Dressing + Grilled Shrimp
